name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#夏色FullBloom ⧸ 夏色まつり誕生ライブ【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [pKc5qSSWJQs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri performs her song 'Summer Flowers I Watch With You' in a yukata, surrounded by sunflowers and virtual fireworks.
scenes.song_name: Summer Flowers I Watch With You (君と眺める夏の花)

scenes.description: Matsuri transitions between songs, thanking the fans and dancing to the interlude.
Matsuri performs the song 'Fire◎Flower' on a stage with changing lighting and sunflower visuals.

subtitles.original: ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: まだまだ上がるよ
subtitles.english: It's still going up

subtitles.original: 今夜の花火もテンションも
subtitles.english: Tonight's fireworks and my excitement too

subtitles.original: 華やか賑やか見るもの全てが眩しくて
subtitles.english: Elegant and lively, everything I see is so dazzling

subtitles.original: シャカシャカパカパカ頬張る　食べ歩き日和
subtitles.english: Munching and crunching, it's a perfect day for snacking

subtitles.original: さあ　パンパカパカパカやって
subtitles.english: Now, let's go with a fanfare

subtitles.original: クスクス笑わせて
subtitles.english: Make me giggle

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔の花火が打ち上がる
subtitles.english: The fireworks of your smile are being launched

subtitles.original: さあ　楽しみ祭りだ止まるな
subtitles.english: Now, it's a festival of fun, don't stop

subtitles.original: ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: 弾けるリズムは最後まで
subtitles.english: This bursting rhythm until the end

subtitles.original: 浴衣も忘れて跳ねるよ
subtitles.english: I'll jump and forget about my yukata

subtitles.original: ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: もっともっと上がるよ
subtitles.english: It's going higher and higher

subtitles.original: 空に大きな夏の華
subtitles.english: A big summer flower in the sky

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日は来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming today!

subtitles.original: まだまだ始まったばかり！最後まで盛り上がっていってね！
subtitles.english: It's just the beginning! Keep the energy up until the end!

subtitles.original: 綿飴頬張り溶けるよ
subtitles.english: Munching on cotton candy, it melts

subtitles.original: 一瞬輝く時間もかけてよ
subtitles.english: Spend that brief shining moment with me

subtitles.original: 君との思い出溶けない
subtitles.english: Memories with you won't melt away

subtitles.original: 一生消えない宝物
subtitles.english: They're treasures that will last a lifetime

subtitles.original: 祭りだ祭りだ祭りだ
subtitles.english: It's a festival, a festival, a festival

subtitles.original: ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: 流れる光に照らされて
subtitles.english: Illuminated by the flowing light

subtitles.original: 全てが眩しい思い出
subtitles.english: Everything is a dazzling memory

subtitles.original: ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: もっともっと輝け
subtitles.english: Shine more and more

subtitles.original: 君と並べる夏の華
subtitles.english: The summer flower blooming next to you

subtitles.original: 最初から君を好きでいられてよかったなんて空に歌うんだ
subtitles.english: I'll sing to the sky that I'm glad I could love you from the start

subtitles.original:
Fire◎Flower
作詞・作曲: halyosy
subtitles.english:
Fire◎Flower
Lyrics & Music: halyosy

subtitles.original: 積み上げた想い　打ち上げる場所
subtitles.english: The feelings I've built up, the place to launch them

subtitles.original: 探し求めて　この街から出た
subtitles.english: I left this town in search of it

subtitles.original: 震える着信　電源を切った
subtitles.english: A vibrating call, I turned off the power

subtitles.original: 燃え出す導火線　誰も止められない
subtitles.english: The fuse is burning, no one can stop it

subtitles.original: 世界の終わりが　今訪れたとしたら
subtitles.english: If the end of the world were to come now

subtitles.original: 全部放り投げて
subtitles.english: I'd throw everything aside

subtitles.original: 二人永遠に一緒なのにね
subtitles.english: And we'd be together forever, right?

subtitles.original: Like a Fire Flower
subtitles.english: Like a Fire Flower

subtitles.original: 僕が消えちゃわないように
subtitles.english: So that I don't disappear

subtitles.original: 火の粉散らせ　夢打ち上がれ
subtitles.english: Scatter the sparks, let the dream soar

subtitles.original: 最初から君を好きにならなきゃよかったなんて
subtitles.english: Saying I wish I hadn't loved you from the start

subtitles.original: 嘘までついて
subtitles.english: I even lied like that

subtitles.original: 慣れない景色　不自然な笑顔
subtitles.english: Unfamiliar scenery, an unnatural smile

subtitles.original: 華やかな祭りと　違ってた
subtitles.english: It was different from the lively festival

subtitles.original: 繰り返す「頑張れ」の声
subtitles.english: The repeated voices saying "Do your best"

subtitles.original: 涙で導火線　消えちゃいそうだよ
subtitles.english: It feels like my fuse will be put out by tears

subtitles.original: 宇宙の始まりが　あの口づけだとしたら
subtitles.english: If that kiss was the beginning of the universe

subtitles.original: 星空は
subtitles.english: Then the starry sky

subtitles.original: 二人がこぼした奇跡の跡
subtitles.english: Is the trail of the miracle we spilled

subtitles.original: Like a Fire Flower
subtitles.english: Like a Fire Flower

subtitles.original: 君が見つけやすいように
subtitles.english: So that you can easily find me

subtitles.original: 雷鳴の如く　夢轟かせ
subtitles.english: Let the dream roar like thunder

subtitles.original: 最初から君を好きにならなきゃよかったなんて
subtitles.english: Saying I wish I hadn't loved you from the start

subtitles.original: バレてるんだろうな
subtitles.english: You probably know I was lying
